algorithm_technique: Simulation with direction tracking and obstacle checking
problem_summary_simple: Simulate a robot's movement on a grid, avoiding obstacles, and find the furthest point reached.
problem_summary_technical: Simulate robot movement using direction vectors and a set for efficient obstacle lookup, tracking max squared distance.
key_insights: Represent directions using a list of tuples for easy rotation.
Use a set for O(1) average time complexity obstacle lookups.
Track the maximum squared Euclidean distance incrementally.
